content.icerik: Intense Hydrating & Nourishing Face Cream Pomegranate face cream with UV-protection is developed for extra dry and sensitive skin.It stimulates collagen production, vital for regeneration and repair of skin tissue.Enriched with a firming hexapeptide Peptamide-6 and an age-defying antioxidant complex of pomegranate extract and Vitamin A & E, this product combats the effects of time and defends the skin against environmental damages, restores and maintains the natural moisture level and elasticity of the skin.Pentavitin®, Shea nut butter nourishes, hydrates and revitalizes the skin, leaving it soft, smooth and silky. Applied regularly skins healthy appearance improves, skin becomes more firm, luminous and fresh looking.
